xtc.lang.cpp

Interface SemanticValues

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSemanticValues, ExpressionSemanticValues

    public interface SemanticValues
    Support for semantic actions and parser context. *
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.4 $

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SemanticValues.ValueType
      The types of semantic values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean changeName(int id)
      Determine whether a production's AST should have a different name than the original symbol name.
      Object getValue(int id, String name, Pair<Object> values)
      Get the semantic value for the specific production.
      SemanticValues.ValueType getValueType(int id)
      Determine a production's value type.
      boolean isComplete(int id)
      Determine whether a production represents a complete semantic unit.
      String newName(int id)
      Get the new name for the production's AST node only if changeName is true.

    • Method Detail

      • isComplete

        boolean isComplete(int id)
        Determine whether a production represents a complete semantic unit. The default implementation returns true.
        Parameters:
        id - The production ID.
        Returns:
        true if the production is a complete semantc unit.

      • getValueType

        SemanticValues.ValueType getValueType(int id)
        Determine a production's value type. The default implementation simply returns SemanticValues.ValueType.NODE.
        Parameters:
        id - The production ID.
        Returns:
        The corresponding value type.

      • getValue

        Object getValue(int id,
              String name,
              Pair<Object> values)
        Get the semantic value for the specific production. The default implementation signals an invalid state.
        Parameters:
        id - The production's symbol ID.
        name - The production's name.
        values - The values that make up the production.
        Returns:
        The value of the production.

      • changeName

        boolean changeName(int id)
        Determine whether a production's AST should have a different name than the original symbol name.
        Parameters:
        id - The production's symbol ID.
        Returns:
        true if the name should be changed.

      • newName

        String newName(int id)
        Get the new name for the production's AST node only if changeName is true.
        Parameters:
        id - The production's symbol ID.
        Returns:
        The new name of the production's AST or null if its name shouldn't be changed.
